meanings.definition: The act of the moon rising in the sky.
meanings.sent1: The moonrises are always so beautiful to watch.
meanings.sent2: I love taking evening walks to see the moonrises.
meanings.sent3: During the camping trip, we all gathered to admire the moonrises together.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed under the moonrises, filling the night with joy.
meanings.sent5: The moonrises painted the sky with a silver glow, enchanting all who gazed upon them.

meanings.definition: The time when the moon rises.
meanings.sent1: Do you know the exact time of the moonrises tonight?
meanings.sent2: The moonrises have been happening earlier each evening.
meanings.sent3: We set up a telescope to observe the moonrises more closely.
meanings.sent4: The moonrises mark the beginning of a peaceful night.
meanings.sent5: As the moonrises, it signals the start of a new lunar cycle.
